summary: Tested StatusAnimation shared component extraction and full sync Stop button implementation. Both features working correctly: (1) StatusAnimation component renders on landing page navigation icons and in admin Layout Preview module, (2) Full sync endpoints support background task with polling status and cancel functionality, (3) TxbInventoryTab shows progress bar and Stop button during sync operations.
passed_tests: Landing page loads without errors with mosaic-landing layout
StatusAnimation renders on 6 navigation icons with 'En Desarrollo' status
Full sync POST returns {status: 'started'} and starts background task
Full sync GET /status returns running/completed/cancelled status with progress
Full sync POST /cancel returns {status: 'cancelling'} then cancels background task
Admin TxbInventoryTab loads with Full Sync section
Full Sync button triggers sync and shows progress bar with Stop button
Stop button (red Square icon) appears during sync and cancels operation
Toast shows 'Sync stopped. Processed X/Y (Created: N, Updated: M)' after cancel
Admin Layout Preview & Icons module loads correctly
Layout cards display with icon preview using shared StatusAnimation
Admin sidebar navigation works with all groups (Overview, Commerce, School Textbooks, Community, Management, Configuration, Content)
